answers.answer: I dont have it but I will say from experience being induced is not bad ( my opinion)  and I know u asked ppl who is going thru this but I just wanted to givr u an answer so u wouldnt feel ignored
I was told at 32 weeks and induced...well...right now at 32+5
My sister in law was told when she was about 34 weeks

I was diagnosed with it at 30 weeks with my first. Was found via a routine urine and blood pressure check up at my doctor's appt. I was admitted to hospital straight away, and had emergency c section at 33w 5d. Pre eclampsia only gets worse, it is only cured once the baby is delivered.
Awe thanks charletta! And dang so I guess I will just have to be careful as much as possible that's a scary thing! Thanks ladies for ur experiences!

question: For those who had to go thru this.. when were you told you had it? My cousin was told around 5 months...i am 6 months and just had an appt yesterday and was told I was fine. I guess I'm just worrying because I don't eat very well (salt addiction) and I know you can have high blood pressure at any time during ur pregnancy.. also because I really don't want to be induced because of preeclampsia. ;(
title: preeclampsia
